alert.note: Alert for Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 05 at 1:53AM MST until January 06 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures ranging from 30 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Tonopah Desert and Southeast Valley/Queen Creek. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Tonopah Desert
